title: California fire disaster 1970
brief_description: Fire service experts discuss the causes, problems and results of the extensive fires occurring in California in 1970. In news documentary format they cover various aspects of preventing and fighting large scale fires. In news documentary format.
description: Fire service experts discuss the causes, problems and results of the extensive fires occurring in California in 1970. In news documentary format they cover various aspects of preventing and fighting large scale fires. In news documentary format.
